enhanced_text: Two pizzas, one with a golden crust and the other with a white crust, are placed side by side on a wooden table. The golden crust pizza has a topping of melted cheese, pepperoni, and green bell peppers. The white crust pizza has a topping of tomato sauce, mushrooms, and olives.
